website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this pill splitter has some unique features and a nice design; though it may be difficult for some individuals to use.

product_meta.title: 3 in 1 PIll Crusher Cutter
product_meta.description:
The Pill Crusher and Splitter is a three-in-one device that cuts, crushes, and saving pills safely. To crush pills, unscrew the top of the unit and place one or two pills into the crushing chamber. Screw the top on and continue to twist until pills are crushed into a fine powder
The top chamber of the device easily divides pills while keeping your fingers safe.To split pills, open the top of the Pill Splitter and position the pill in the flat cutting area, then lower the top and close firmly.
The bottom chamber can be used to store multiple pills or store unused portions of split pills

Easy-to-use design for limited dexterity users
